description: Sharpe Resources Corporation engages in the exploration and development of mineral resources and oil and gas in the western United States. The company primarily focuses on the coal, coal bed methane, and shale gas projects. It principally holds interests in the coal seams on 17,000 acres property located in Preston County, West Virginia. The company was formerly known as Sharpe Energy & Resources Limited and changed its name to Sharpe Resources Corporation in July 1996. Sharpe Resources Corporation was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Heathsville, Virginia.
